name: Soapbox Race World (Need for Speed World)
description: * OUTDATED * Patched launcher so it doesn't crash with SecureChannelFailure - https://github.com/BlazeKl/GameLauncher_NFSW
content:
files:
- nfsw_installer: https://github.com/BlazeKl/GameLauncher_NFSW/releases/download/2.1.0.4a/Release.zip
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: $GAMEDIR/GameLauncher.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Creating Wine prefix.
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- extract:
    description: Extracting installer.
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    file: nfsw_installer
    format: zip
wine:
  overrides:
    dinput8: n,b
    lightfx: n,b
  version: lutris-nfsworld-5.4-x86_64
